question:
Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to the pond and rockery in the community ahead. At your current location, if the pond and rockery are not within your field of view, what is the most relevant object in your field of view, and where is this object?  
choose:  
A. I can already see the pond and rockery within my field of view.  
B. I cannot see the pond and rockery, but there is a commercial building in the front left of my field of view.  
C. I cannot see the pond and rockery, but there is a large central square with a fountain in the middle and lower part of my field of view.  
D. I cannot see the pond and rockery, but I can see the top of a high-rise building in the upper right corner of my field of view.  
E. I cannot see the pond and rockery, but there is a parking lot in the lower left part of my field of view.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: C; Reason: The initial frames show a large central square with a fountain in the middle and lower part of the field of view, which is the most prominent feature before the pond and rockery come into view.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 10)]
Option: C
Reason: At the initial position (0:00-0:10), the pond and rockery are not yet visible. The most prominent and relevant object in the field of view, located in the middle and lower part of the frame, is a large central square featuring a fountain. This square is directly in the direction of the community ahead, serving as a key landmark before the pond and rockery are revealed by the camera's pan and zoom (which occurs from approximately 0:10 onwards, with the pond becoming clearly visible around 0:17). The provided answer correctly identifies this feature and its location.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: C; Reason: The initial frames show a large central square with a fountain in the middle and lower part of the field of view, which is the most prominent feature before the pond and rockery come into view.
